brew: pandoc # Swiss-army knife of markup format conversion
poppler # PDF rendering library (based on the xpdf-3.0 code base)
imagemagick # Tools and libraries to manipulate images in many formats
ffmpeg # Play, record, convert, and stream audio and video
cask: wkhtmltopdf # wkhtmltopdf is an open source (LGPL) command line tools to render HTML into PDF and various image formats using the QT Webkit rendering engine
calibre # E-book manager, viewer, and converter.
inkscape # Inkscape is a professional vector graphics editor
vlc # VLC is a free and open source cross-platform multimedia player and framework
